dt-option.name: searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.value
dt-option.summary: Define the value to be selected

type.description: The the value(s) to be selected.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.value` option is `undefined` meaning that if this is not defined then no values will be applied to the criteria.
dt-option.description:
This is useful as it allows predefined criteria values to be set.
`-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.value` is an array so that conditions that require multiple inputs can be set easily.

example.title: Defining the value for use in a criteria
Defining the values for use in a multi value criteria
